Wilmington.Blue Clay Farms, North Carolina:
Blue Clay Farms is an unincorporated community and census-designated place in New Hanover County, North Carolina, United States. Its population was 33 as of the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the community has an area of 2.455 square miles (6.36 km2); 2.439 square miles (6.32 km2) of its area is land, and 0.016 square miles (0.041 km2) is water.
